attributes.additional_details: Because we need a season 7 of line of duty.
attributes.background: Save Ted Hastings from being made to retire

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

We understand you're probably concerned about one thing and one thing only, and that’s bent coppers. However, staffing for AC-12 is an operational decision for Central Police and not decided by the UK Government or Parliament. 

If you'd like to influence local policing decisions in England, you may be eligible to vote in the Police and Crime Commissioner elections on May 6th. You can find out more here:

https://www.choosemypcc.org.uk/
